name: h3
description: The 2025 Warstic Bonesaber Composite Drop 11 Fastpitch Softball Bat is engineered for peak performance, offering a balanced swing feel that enhances player control. Certified for USSSA, USA Softball (ASA), NSA, ISA, and WBSC, this bat is versatile across multiple leagues. Its two-piece composite design features a 2 1/4 inch diameter Bonesaber Katana Speed Composite Barrel, delivering maximum performance with every hit. With a Precision Knob for pro-style comfort, an Optimized Connection Piece for reduced vibration, and a Tsuka Max Warrior’s Grip for enhanced cushioning and tackiness, this bat ensures a smoother, more powerful swing. The Feather Lite Composite Cap further boosts durability and swing speed, making it an essential choice for competitive players. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 273 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
